Author: Kalle Launiala
Body:
The Ball / Caloom platform powered websites are reaching beyond traditional web content management. The sites that were the first ones represented modern text-based content:

[Aalto Global Impact](http://www.aaltoglobalimpact.org) and
[Weconomy](http://www.weconomy.fi)

For free hands-on tryout experience we've set up [demo.caloom.com](http://demo.caloom.com). For actual piloting contact us, so that we can better position you onwards to proper platform site; be it business, university or school approach :-).

CollectionContent.Excerpt: The end user/customer/citizen approaching value-adding solutions
CollectionContent.Name: Category
CollectionContent.Title: Solutions

Excerpt: Choose the tool that accelerates and enables you. Currently the Ball can solve this in unique fashion for easy content management and collaboration.
Name: TextContent
SubTitle: Right Tool for The Job
Title: Modern Web Presence
